original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady in mid-day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady in the mid-day trade on Monday as results of a 180,0000 million bond auction is awaited, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted at 32.00/25 percent on Monday, up from 31.75/32.00 percent on Friday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted unchanged at 27.75/28.25 percent.
